participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Margaret is warm-hearted, curious, and adventurous. She has a passion for exploring new cultures and enjoys sharing her travel stories with others.
participant_1.background: i'm 60years old. i've visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: David is practical, dedicated, and sports-oriented. He values stability and enjoys spending time with his family, often engaging in outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i own a house in florida. i've a children and a dogs. i am a male. i enjoy american sports.
